title: Remove Leadership Team section and placeholder media from Gallery

requirements.summary: Remove the Leadership Team section from the About page
acceptanceCriteria: Leadership Team section is completely removed from the About page
Page layout remains clean and professional after removal
Other sections (founder info, history, mission, values) remain intact

file_operations.description: Remove the Leadership Team section and all its associated JSX, state, and data structures while preserving the founder information, history, mission, and values sections. Ensure the page layout remains clean and professional after the removal.

requirements.summary: Remove all placeholder photos from the Gallery page photo gallery section
acceptanceCriteria: All placeholder photo entries are removed from the photo gallery tab
Photo gallery section displays empty state or message indicating no photos available

file_operations.description: Remove all placeholder photo entries from the photo gallery data array. Replace the photo grid with an empty state message such as 'No photos available at this time' or similar user-friendly text. Ensure the Photos tab remains functional and the tab navigation structure is preserved.

requirements.summary: Remove all placeholder videos from the Gallery page video gallery section
acceptanceCriteria: All placeholder video entries are removed from the video gallery tab
Video gallery section displays empty state or message indicating no videos available

file_operations.description: Remove all placeholder video entries from the video gallery data array. Replace the video grid with an empty state message such as 'No videos available at this time' or similar user-friendly text. Ensure the Videos tab remains functional and the tab navigation structure is preserved.
